title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7342.1 - Policy
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7342.1 - Policy

State Regulations
(a) Youth shall be
permitted to visit family members when the death of a family member is
imminent, or after death has occurred, subject to the provisions of this

Part. (b) Consistent with the
requirements of this Part, every director and sheriff shall develop written
policies and procedures that govern deathbed and funeral visits. These policies
and procedures shall be reviewed annually and updated as needed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7342.1

Adopted

New

York State Register September 26, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 39, eff. 9/26/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
